description: Derek and Skyler met up at a hotel room the other day to fuck each other on camera. Skyler had never done this before and is mostly straight. He wants to be a porn star, though, so he decided to start off with gay porn. He doesn't think getting fucked in the ass makes him gay, he just likes his ass eaten and fucked. What is gay about that? Watch as Derek fucks a straight boy's ass and then take his load on his face.
title: Teasing And Pleasing
